title: Castle Clinton National Monument: Park Home
body: Built to keep people out; now welcomes millions in.  Located at the southern tip of Manhattan Island, Castle Clinton stands where New York City began, and represents not only the cityâ€™s growth, but the growth of a nation. Initially intended to prevent a British invasion in 1812, the fortification has transformed over the years to welcome theatergoers, immigrants, sightseers, and now, millions of visitors to New York Harbor.                Every Kid In A Park   The Every Kid in A Park program invites every 4th grade student to vist the National Parks during the 2015-2016 school year for free.         Artful Memories of Manhattans Vanguard   Although the former fortification has changed over time, its beauty and activities have been captured in drawings and photos.               History as Diverse as New York City   An Amazing example of adaptive reuse Castle Clinton has changed with the times much like the city of New York.         Easy to Find...Even in New York   Castle Clinton is located in Battery park at the southern tip of Manhattan, and is accessible by car, bus, subway and ferry.
